item.title: xscreensaver
item.description: Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page. “XScreenSaver is a screen saver and locker for the X Window System. " Some resources. the github page here. the arch wiki page here. Install alacritty manually. install the xscreensaver command. copy .xscreensaver inside your ~/ directory. Gallery. Available soon. Snippets on the dotfiles repo. Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.
item.content:
Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.

“XScreenSaver is a screen saver and locker for the X Window System. "

Some resources.

  • the github page here.
  • the arch wiki page here.

Install alacritty manually.

  • install the xscreensaver command.
  • copy .xscreensaver inside your ~/ directory.

Gallery.

Available soon.
Snippets on the dotfiles repo.

Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.
